keypair
Class EncryptDecrypt

java.lang.Object
  keypair.EncryptDecrypt

public class EncryptDecrypt
extends java.lang.Object

RSA cryptosystem. Encrypts/decrypts one number at a time.

1.2.2009
Author:
Petri Tuononen
